## TryCpConductor.installApp() method

Install a hApp bundle into the conductor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
installApp(appBundleSource: AppBundleSource, options?: AppOptions): Promise<AgentApp>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  appBundleSource | AppBundleSource | The bundle or path to the bundle. |
|  options | [AppOptions](./tryorama.appoptions.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> [AppOptions](./tryorama.appoptions.md) for the hApp bundle (optional). |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[AgentApp](./tryorama.agentapp.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A hApp for the agent.
